sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { loginForm: FormGroup = new FormGroup({ email: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.email]), password: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(6)]), }); constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } onSubmit() { get email() { return this.loginForm.get('email'); } get password() { return this.loginForm.get('password'); } }

Log in
